<script>
function printtList(page,type=''){
    let data;

    if(!page) page = 1;

    try{    
        data = $.ajax({
            url: '../getListCategory.php',
            type: 'POST',
            data: { 'page': page, 'type' : type}
        });
        data = JSON.parse(data) || false;
  
    }catch(e){
        console.log(e);
    }
  return data;
}
</script>
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="https://marumaru.cloud/img/favicon.ico">

	})

</script>

					<div class="col-md-9 at-col at-main" style="    padding: 0px !important;">
					
							
 

<style>
.view-content br{
	display:none;
}
#no-fouc { opacity: 0; }

.hidden-sm { display:block !important; }
.at-side{
	padding-left: 5px !important;
}

.viewActBottom{position: fixed; display:block;
		z-index: 999999999;
		bottom: 0;
		padding: 0.6em 0;
		width:1200px;
		text-align: center;
		background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);}
.viewAct{display:inline-block;margin:0 0.4em;padding:0.4em;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.6)}
.viewActIcon{display:block;width:3.2em;height:3.2em;cursor:pointer;    background: black;}
.viewActIcon:hover{background-color:#000}
.viewActFixed{position:fixed;padding:1em;bottom:5em;opacity:0.7}
.wrapper{ padding:0px;}
.view-wrap img{
	max-height:100vh;
	width:50%;
	}
@media (max-width: 700px)
{
	.viewActBottom{ width:100%; }
	.at-container {padding: 0px !important;}
}

@media all and (max-width: 600px)
{
	.hidden-sm { display:none !important; }
	.viewActIcon{display:block;width:2em;height:2em;cursor:pointer}
	.view-wrap img{
	width:80%;
	}
}


.col-md-9{
	padding: 0px !important;

}

.at-main{
	float: left !important;
}
.btn-danger.dropdown-toggle {
		background-color: #ff3547 !important;
}
.dropdown-item {
		display: block;
		width: 100%;
		padding: .25rem 1.5rem;
		clear: both;
		font-weight: 400;
		color: #212529;
		text-align: inherit;
		white-space: nowrap;
		background-color: transparent;
		border: 0;
}

.col-4 {
		-webkit-box-flex: 0;
		-ms-flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
		flex: 0 0 33.333333%;
		width: 33%;
		float: left;
		text-align: center;
		/* text-align: right; */

}

.viewerbtn{
	background: black;
		opacity: 0.7;
}
.viewerbtn a{
	color:#fff;
	font-weight:bold;
}


.view-wrap.on .view-content{
	text-align: center;
		display: flex;
		align-items: center;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
		justify-content: flex-start;
		flex-direction: column;
}

.view-wrap.on {
		position: fixed;
		left: 0;
		right: 0;
		bottom: 0;
		top: 0;
		-webkit-transition: all .2s;
		transition: all .2s;
		z-index: 999;
		overflow: auto;
		background: #2e2e2e;
	overflow-y:hidden;
}

@media all and (max-width: 600px){
	.banner_m {
		margin:0px !important;
	}

		width: 100vw;
	}

		width:100vw;    line-height: 40px;

	}

		width: 100%;
	}

	}
}

</style>


<script>
	$(window).load(function(){

	window.mobilecheck = function() {
	var check = false;
	(function(a){if(/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|mobile.+firefox|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows ce|xda|xiino/i.test(a)||/1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0,4))) check = true;})(navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera);
	return check;
	};

	var mobilesize = mobilecheck() ? '80%' : '50%';
	var onyourSession = localStorage.getItem('on');



	if(onyourSession)
	{
			$('.viewer a').addClass('on');
			$('.viewer a').text('리스트보기');
			$('.view-wrap').addClass('on');
			$('.view-wrap  img').css('width', mobilesize);
			$('#viewActIconZoom').attr('src','');
	}



	$('.viewer > a').click(function(){
		var className = $('.viewer a').attr('class');
		if(className == 'on'){
			$('.page-btn').css('display','none');
			localStorage.removeItem('on');
			$(".view-wrap img").css("display","flex");
			$('.view-wrap img').css('width', mobilesize);
			$('.viewer a').removeClass('on');
			$('.viewer a').text('뷰어보기');
			$('.view-wrap').removeClass('on');
		}else{
			$(".view-wrap img").css("display","none")
			$(".view-wrap img").eq(0).css("display","flex")
			$('.page-btn').css('display','flex');
			localStorage.setItem('on', true);
			$('.viewer a').addClass('on');
			$('.viewer a').text('리스트보기');
			$('.view-wrap').addClass('on');
			$('.view-wrap img').css('width', mobilesize);
			$('#viewActIconZoom').attr('src','');
		}
	})


	var page=0;
	var max_page= parseInt($('.view-wrap  img').length);


	function goTop(){
	window.scrollTo(0,0)
	}
	function goBottom(){
		var scrollingElement = (document.scrollingElement || document.body);
		scrollingElement.scrollTop = scrollingElement.scrollHeight;
	}
	function fullscreen(){
		var className = $('.viewer a').attr('class');
		if($('#viewActIconZoom').hasClass('fullscreen')){
			if(className == 'on'){
			$('.view-wrap  img').css('width', mobilesize);
			}else{
				$('.view-wrap   img').css('width', mobilesize);
			}
			$('#viewActIconZoom').removeClass('fullscreen');
			$('#viewActIconZoom').attr('src','');
		}else{
		$('.view-wrap   img').css('width', '100%');
		$('#viewActIconZoom').addClass('fullscreen');
		$('#viewActIconZoom').attr('src','');
		}
	}


	function Back(){
		window.history.back();
	}

	$('.view-wrap').click(function(){
		if($('.view-wrap').hasClass('on')){
			$('.viewActBottom').show();
		}else{
			$('.viewActBottom').toggle();
		}
	})
	function on_viewer_left(){
		if(page<=0) return ;
		page -- ;
		$(".viewercount").html((page+1)+"/"+max_page)
		$(".view-wrap  img").css("display","none")
		$(".view-wrap  img").eq(page).css("display","block")

	}
	function requestFullScreen(element) {

	var requestMethod = element.requestFullScreen || element.webkitRequestFullScreen || element.mozRequestFullScreen || element.msRequestFullScreen;

	if (requestMethod) {
			requestMethod.call(element);
	} else if (typeof window.ActiveXObject !== "undefined") {
			var wscript = new ActiveXObject("WScript.Shell");
			if (wscript !== null) {
					wscript.SendKeys("{F11}");
			}
	}
}

	function on_viewer_right(){
		if(page >= max_page-1){
			return ;
		};
		page++;
		$('.page-btn.left').css('display','flex');
		$(".viewercount").html((page+1)+"/"+max_page)
		$(".view-wrap  img").css("display","none")
		$(".view-wrap  img").eq(page).css("display","flex")

	}

	$(document).keydown(function(e){
		if($('.view-wrap').hasClass('on'))
		{
		if (e.keyCode == 37) {
			on_viewer_left();
		}
		}
	});

	$(document).keydown(function(e){
		if($('.view-wrap').hasClass('on')){
		if (e.keyCode == 39) {
			on_viewer_right();
		}
	}
	});

	$(document).keydown(function(e){
		if (e.keyCode == 113) {

			var elem = document.body;
			requestFullScreen(elem);
		}
	});

			$(document).keydown(function(e){
		if (e.keyCode == 27) {
			$('.page-btn').css('display','none');
			$(".view-wrap  img").css("display","flex");
			$('.view-wrap  img').css('width', '50%');
			$('.viewer a').removeClass('on');
			$('.viewer a').text('뷰어보기');
			$('.view-wrap').removeClass('on');
			localStorage.removeItem('on');
		}
	});


	$(".view-wrap  img").eq(0).css("display","flex");

	$('.page-btn.right').click(function(){
		on_viewer_right();
	})

	$('.page-btn.left').click(function(){
		on_viewer_left();
	})

	$('.viewActZoom').click(function(){
		fullscreen();
	})

	$('.viewAct.Top').click(function(){
		goTop();
	})
	$('.viewAct.Bottom').click(function(){
		goBottom();
	})
})
</script>
<script src="https://marumaru.cloud/js/viewimageresize.js"></script>

src="https://marumaru.cloud/data/file/cmoic/2728278670_RoTa8B2k_5bdbb6bd1430fe55608c8d98f0f86fd43db2f6be.jpg" alt="" class="img-tag "/></div>


<script>
function apms_good(bo_table, wr_id, act, id, wc_id) {
	var href;

	if(wr_id && wc_id) {
		href = './good.comment.php?bo_table=' + bo_table + '&wr_id=' + wr_id + '&good=' + act + '&wc_id=' + wc_id;
	} else {
		if(wr_id) {
			href = '/bbs/good.apms.php?bo_table=' + bo_table + '&wr_id=' + wr_id + '&good=' + act;
		} else {
			href = './good.php?it_id=' + bo_table + '&good=' + act;
		}
	}

	$.post(href, { js: "on" }, function(data) {
		if(data.error) {
			alert(data.error);
			return false;
		} else if(data.success) {
			alert(data.success);
			$("#"+id).text(number_format(String(data.count)));
		}
	}, "json");
}

</script>

<script>
$(function(){
	$('.chart').change(function(){
		location.href = "/bbs/cmoic/" + "22739/" + $(this).val();
	})
})
</script>

<div class="view-content">
	<div class="page-btn left" >
	<i class="fa fa-arrow-left"></i>
	</div>

	<div class="page-btn right" >
	<i class="fa fa-arrow-right"></i>
	</div>

	</div>

<script>
 $(function(){

$('.bookmark').click(function(){

	 var type = '';
	 var name = '';
	 var b_comicID = '22739';
	if(!name)	alert('로그인후 북마크 기능이 이용가능합니다.'); return false;
	 $.ajax({
		 url: '/bookmark.php',
		 type: 'POST',
		 data: {'type' : type, 'name' : name, 'b_comicID' : b_comicID},
		 success:function(data){

		}
	 });


})
})
</script>



	<div class="clearfix"></div>


</div>

<script>
function board_move(href){
	window.open(href, "boardmove", "left=50, top=50, width=500, height=550, scrollbars=1");
}
$(function() {
	$("a.view_image").click(function() {
		window.open(this.href, "large_image", "location=yes,links=no,toolbar=no,top=10,left=10,width=10,height=10,resizable=yes,scrollbars=no,status=no");
		return false;
	});
	});
</script>

.category-image {
  align-self: center;
  background: black;
  border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px;
}

.category-image-responsive {
  max-width: 100%;
  display: block;
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
}

.categories-list {
  margin: 0 auto;
  max-width: 1200px;
}

.category {
 
}

.category-title {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-weight: 900;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  font-size: 16px;
  color:#fff;
}

.category-subtitle {
  font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
  font-weight: 400;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  font-size: 12px;
  color:#ccc;
}

.category-description {
  background: #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-around;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 10px;
  max-width: 320px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  flex-direction: row;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

  width: 100%;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  text-decoration: none;
  align-items: center;
}

		<script>
		function basic_outlogin_form(f) {
			if (f.mb_id.value == '') {
				alert('아이디를 입력해 주세요.');
				f.mb_id.focus();
				return false;
			}
			if (f.mb_password.value == '') {
				alert('비밀번호를 입력해 주세요.');
				f.mb_password.focus();
				return false;
			}
			return true;
		}
		</script>
	</div>		</div>
		<!-- 로그인 끝 -->

					<input type="text" name="mb_id" id="sidebar_mb_id" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="아이디" tabindex="91">
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="form-group">	
				<div class="input-group">
					<span class="input-group-addon"><i class="fa fa-lock gray"></i></span>
					<input type="password" name="mb_password" id="sidebar_mb_password" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="비밀번호" tabindex="92">
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="form-group">
				<button type="submit" class="btn btn-navy btn-block" tabindex="93">Login</button>    
			</div>	

			<label class="text-muted" style="letter-spacing:-1px;">
				<input type="checkbox" name="auto_login" value="1" id="sidebar_remember_me" class="remember-me" tabindex="94">
				자동로그인 및 로그인 상태 유지
			</label>
		</form>

		
		<div class="h10"></div>

		
		<!-- Member -->
		<div class="div-title-underline-thin en">
			<b>MEMBER</b>
		</div>
		<ul class="sidebar-list list-links">
			<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/register.php">회원가입</a></li>
			<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/password_lost.php" class="win_password_lost">아이디/비밀번호 찾기</a></li>
		</ul>
		
	</div>

<div class="h20"></div>

<!-- Service -->
<div class="div-title-underline-thin en">
	<b>SERVICE</b>
</div>

<ul class="sidebar-list list-links">
		<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/faq.php">자주하시는 질문(FAQ)</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/qalist.php">1:1 문의</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/new.php">새글모음</a></li>
	<li><a href="https://marumaru.cloud/bbs/current_connect.php">현재접속자</a></li>
</ul>
		</div>

		<!-- Response -->
		<div id="sidebar-response" class="sidebar-item">
			<div id="sidebar-response-list"></div>
		</div>

		
		<div class="h30"></div>
	</div>

</aside>

<div id="sidebar-box-mask" class="sidebar-close"></div>


<!-- 아미나빌더 1.8.0 / 그누보드 5.3.1.6 -->
<!-- ie6,7에서 사이드뷰가 게시판 목록에서 아래 사이드뷰에 가려지는 현상 수정 -->
<!--[if lte IE 7]>
<script>
$(function() {
    var $sv_use = $(".sv_use");
    var count = $sv_use.length;

    $sv_use.each(function() {
        $(this).css("z-index", count);
        $(this).css("position", "relative");
        count = count - 1;
    });
});
</script>
<![endif]-->

</body>
</html>

<!-- 사용스킨 : basic -->
